advancement.label: You gain one level for completing this adventure.
advancement.footnote: (If you decline this level, you still record legacy events but cannot claim any rewards or legacy event benefits for this adventure.)

legacy.footnote: (A character that dies during an adventure should still receive any legacy events that they earned, based on the discretion of the DM. If they declined the level, they cannot gain any benefits from legacy events that are provided when a level is gained.)
